transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .my-hero{align-items:center;-webkit-clip-path:polygon(0 0,100% 0,100% 93%,0 100%);clip-path:polygon(0 0,100% 0,100% 93%,0 100%);display:flex;height:80vh;justify-content:space-around;padding-left:5rem;width:100%}.avatar{bottom:-5.6rem;order:1;position:relative}.avatar img{height:auto;width:35rem}.headline-container{height:132px;margin-bottom:5rem;position:relative;z-index:10}h1,h2,h3{font-family:Playpen Sans,cursive;margin:0;text-align:left}h1{font-size:5.5rem;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:.5rem;position:relative;text-shadow:1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.616);word-spacing:-1rem}h1 span{color:var(--btn-color);font-family:Playpen Sans,cursive}.dark h1{text-shadow:1px 1px 2px hsla(0,0%,69%,.267)}h2{font-size:2rem;font-weight:700}h2,h3{margin-left:.5rem}h3{font-size:1rem;font-weight:100;line-height:1.5rem;margin-top:.5rem}.social-links{display:flex;gap:1.5rem;justify-content:left;margin-left:1rem;margin-top:2rem}svg{color:#000;height:auto!important;width:1.6rem!important}.dark a:hover,a:hover{background-color:transparent!important}.dark svg{color:#fff}svg:hover{color:var(--btn-color)}@media screen and (max-width:1350px){h1{font-size:4.8rem!important}h2{font-size:1.4rem!important}h3{font-size:.9rem!important}}@media screen and (max-width:990px){.my-hero{flex-direction:column;gap:2rem;justify-content:center;padding:0;padding-bottom:7rem!important;position:relative;top:-2rem}h1{font-size:3rem!important;word-spacing:-.2rem}h1,h2{text-align:center}h2{font-size:1.4rem!important}h3{font-size:.9rem!important;text-align:center}.headline-container{display:flex;flex-direction:column;margin-bottom:0;order:2}.avatar{order:1}.avatar img{animation:dropImage 2s;border-radius:50%;position:relative;top:-4rem;width:17rem}.social-links{justify-content:center;position:relative;top:-1rem}}
